snippet: Lawmakers on Thursday overrode Gov. Pete Ricketts’ veto of a 6-cent-per-gallon gas tax increase to pay for road and bridge repairs.
abstract: Nebraska lawmakers override Gov Pete Ricketts' veto of a 6-cents-per-gallon gas tax increase; measure is intended to fund road and bridge repairs.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers on Thursday overrode Gov. Pete Ricketts’ veto of a 6-cent-per-gallon gas tax increase to pay for road and bridge repairs.

headline.main: Nebraska: Veto of Gas-Tax Increase Is Overridden
headline.print_headline: Nebraska: Veto of Gas-Tax Increase Is Overridden
